one of the buttons of his coat and looking down at him the Englishman was short began repeating the terms of the wager to him in English. 
"Wait!" cried Dolokhov, hammering with the bottle on the window sill to attract atten- tion. "Wait a bit, Kuragin. Listen! If anyone else does the same, I will pay him a hundred imperials. Do you understand?"
